interest: Evaluation and Impact Analysis Case management/care coordination Health and Rehabilitation Services Traumatic brain injury Spinal cord injury
project: 1. EMPOWER (https://empower-project.eu) is a European platform to promote health and wellbeing in the workplace. The EMPOWER research and innovation project will develop and implement a novel, low-cost, eHealth platform to reduce the impact of mental health problems in the workplace. See here https://rsph.anu.edu.au/research/projects/empower
4. Consultancy as evidence based practice advisor to icareNSW on disability and rehabilitation
